name: Fat Nelson
description: Fat Nelson combines a bouquet of hybridized genetics to create a formidable flower with pleasant and uplifting effects. Colorado Seed Inc. crossed Sour Willie (Willie's Sour Diesel x Vietnamese Black x Highland Nepalese) and the proprietary Gupta Kush to form a strain that doesn’t sacrifice diversity for stability. This bud offers a bright mind and light effects that add a happy glow to outdoor activities and a creative edge to everyday tasks.
descriptionPlain: Fat Nelson combines a bouquet of hybridized genetics to create a formidable flower with pleasant and uplifting effects. Colorado Seed Inc. crossed Sour Willie (Willie's Sour Diesel x Vietnamese Black x Highland Nepalese) and the proprietary Gupta Kush to form a strain that doesn’t sacrifice diversity for stability. This bud offers a bright mind and light effects that add a happy glow to outdoor activities and a creative edge to everyday tasks.

highlightedReviews.text: This strain is very uplifting and makes you in the mind state of wanting to get things done. Smoke a fatty of Nelson anytime during the day and you will feel that anything is possible!
Smells and tastes amazing, way more floral than we expected. Very dense and sticky. It. Got. Me. STONED. Not too sleepy but munchies all bad. Good weed for a video game binge or X Files marathon...
